snippet: The Spanish government warned on Friday that it would take unspecified retaliatory measures against Argentina if it proceeded with plans to take back control of YPF, the large oil and gas producer, from Repsol, its Spanish parent.
abstract: Spanish government warns that it will take unspecified retaliatory measures against Argentina if it proceeds with plans to take back control of YPF, the large oil and gas producer, from Repsol, its Spanish parent.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish government warned on Friday that it would take unspecified retaliatory measures against Argentina if it proceeded with plans to take back control of YPF, the large oil and gas producer, from Repsol, its Spanish parent.

headline.seo: Spain Warns Argentina About YPF Takeover
headline.main: Spain Cautions Argentina on Takeover of Energy Firm
headline.print_headline: Spain Cautions Argentina On Takeover of Energy Firm
